text: Mr Blobby is a fictional character from the BBC1 television programme Noel's House Party. He was a large pink "blob" covered with yellow spots. Mr Blobby had a toothy grin and jiggling eyes. He communicated by saying the word "blobby" in an electronically-changed voice. His moods were shown by changes in the tone of his voice and repetition. Category:Television characters
title: Mr Blobby
